name: Stahlregen + Flexi + Geiss - Spiral Beats (Fractal Mix)

shape_0_per_frame1=ang = ang + q1 - q2;

shapecode_3_y=0.500

shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.4*sin((time+bass)*1.133);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.4*sin((time+bass)*1.333);
per_frame_3=wave_b = 0.5 + 0.4*sin((time+bass)*1.533);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=// And again, beat detection by flexi!
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=vol = bass*8 + mid*4 + treb*2;
per_frame_9=vol = vol*above(vol,17);
per_frame_10=monitor = vol;
per_frame_11=beat = above(vol,res);
per_frame_12=diff = (1-beat)*diff + beat*(vol-res);
per_frame_13=res = beat*(vol+2*diff) + (1-beat)*(res - (diff*0.04 + 0.12)*60/fps);
per_frame_14=res = max(0,res);
per_frame_15=monitor = res;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=x = if(beat,int(rand(60))*0.01 + 0.2,x);
per_frame_18=y = if(beat,int(rand(60))*0.01 + 0.2,y);
per_frame_19=q1 = x;
per_frame_20=q2 = y;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 zoom = 2;
warp_4=`float2 cntr = float2(0,0);
warp_5=`float2 c = float2(0.6,-0.5 + q2);
warp_6=`float2 my_uv = (uv-0.5-cntr)*zoom;
warp_7=`my_uv = float2(my_uv.x*my_uv.x - my_uv.y*my_uv.y, 2*my_uv.x*my_uv.y) + c;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 d = texsize.zw*12;
warp_10=`float3 dx = ( GetBlur3(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur3(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_11=`float3 dy = ( GetBlur3(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur3(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_12=`float2 uv_y = float2(dy.z,-dx.z)*texsize.zw*40 - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*30 - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*20;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float3 julia = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv - floor(my_uv));
warp_15=`float3 pre = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, 0.5 + (uv_orig+uv_y-0.5)*1.002);
warp_16=`
warp_17=`//ret.x = pre.x - (GetBlur2(uv_orig+uv_y).x - pre.x)*0.1  - 0.0 + pre.y*0.01 - pre.z*0.04;
warp_18=`//ret.y = julia.y + 0.004;
warp_19=`//ret.z = julia.z*0.92 + 0.04;
warp_20=`//ret.z = julia.z + 0.008;
warp_21=`ret = julia - 0.004;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`shader_body
comp_6=`{
comp_7=`    uv = 0.05 + 0.9*uv;
comp_8=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_9=`      // SUPER GLOW EDGES - looks awesome w/octopus
comp_10=`      float3 avg_col = GetBlur3(uv);
comp_11=`      ret = abs(avg_col - ret)*6;
comp_12=`    ret *= 1.333; // a little bit of overbright
comp_13=`}
